attributes.action: admit when Prohibtion in the UK will be introduced
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that banning smoking in pubs, nightclubs (and anywhere else where alcohol is sold) is an attempt to deprive these establishments of customers. Why not be honest and just ban the sale of alcohol rather than this stepping stone measure?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
